content: आसद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To sit down or near (with <ab>acc.</ab> or <ab>loc.</ab>). {@--2@} To watch or lie in wait for. {@--3@} To approach, reach, to go to or towards (a place &c.); हिमालयस्यालयप्ताससाद <ls>Ku. 7. 69</ls>; <ls>Bk. 7. 31</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 2</ls>; आसनं <ls>R. 6. 4</ls>, <ls n="R. 6.">53</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 23.</ls> {@--4@} To meet with, find, form; सख्य <ls>R. 5. 60</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 25</ls>; अपायं <ls>Bk. 3. 26</ls> suffering; <ls n="Bk.">4. 43</ls>. {@--5@} To encounter, attack. {@--6@} To commence, undertake. {@--7@} To place. --{c10c} <ab>P.</ab> or {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} ({%a%}) To meet with, find; मृत्युभयमासादितः <ls>Bhāg.</ls> ({%b%}) To get, obtain; अमरगणतालेख्यमासाद्य <ls>R. 8. 95</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 227</ls>; धनं, सुखं &c. {@--2@} To approach, go to, reach; नक्रः स्वस्थानमासाद्य गजेंद्रमपि कर्षति; ते पुण्यमासाद्य सुरेंद्रलोकं <ls>Bg. 9. 20</ls>; <ls>Me. 34</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 37.</ls> {@--3@} To overtake, come up with; अनेन रथवेगेन पूर्वप्रस्थितं वैनतेयमप्यासादयेयं <ls>V. 1</ls>, <ls>Ve. 3. 7.</ls> {@--4@} To encounter, attack; आसादितौ कथं ब्रूतं न गजैः कूलमुद्रुजैः <ls>Bk. 6. 95.</ls> {@--5@} To effect, occasion, accomplish. {@--6@} To make one sit down (<ab>Ved.</ab>).
